Electronic Home Energy Reports, or eHERs, help you better understand your home's energy usage. Each month, you will receive an emailed report that compares your home's energy usage over time, provides energy insights based on your usage and characteristics and shares tips and recommendations designed to help you save energy and money. Enroll now to receive your free monthly report at ehers.alabamapowerprograms.com. Contact Us: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week AlabamaPower.com Account Number: 96762-33381 Web Access Code: 521812 Customer Service: 1-800-245-2244 Power Outage Reporting: 1-800-888-2726 Go Paperless Paperless Billing Clear the clutter of paper by going paperless. Receive email notifications when your bill is ready and view your bill online. Sign up at AlabamaPower.com/paperless. Online Visit AlabamaPower.com/mypayment to make a one-time payment. Or set up your online account by using Account number: 98762-33381 Web access code: 521812 AutoPay Save time and effort with this free bill payment option. Visit AlabamaPower.com/autopay to authorize your bill amount to be automatically debited from your checking or savings account each month. Summary : This figure presents a bar chart of electricity usage (in kWh) by month, with a total usage of 935 kWh, and indicates the next scheduled meter read date as on or after July 16, 2024.

bar chart:
# Title & Axes :
  • Title: "Usage Information"
  • Y-axis: "Total kWh" (units: kWh), tick labels: 0, 310, 620, 930, 1240, 1550
  • X-axis: Months from June 2023 to June 2024 (labels: Jun, Jul, Aug, Sep, Oct, Nov, Dec, Jan, Feb, Mar, Apr, May, Jun)
  • Additional annotation: "Next Scheduled Read Date: On or after July 16, 2024"

# Data Points :
  • Monthly usage bars for each month from June 2023 to June 2024
  • Total used: 935 kWh (likely for the most recent billing period)
  • Individual bar heights (approximate, as exact values are not listed):
    – Jun 2023: ~930 kWh
    – Jul 2023: ~1240 kWh
    – Aug 2023: ~930 kWh
    – Sep 2023: ~930 kWh

# Design Encodings :
  • Vertical bars, single series
  • Grey/black fill (no colour legend)
  • No gridlines, no error bars

# Distribution & Trends :
  • Usage fluctuates monthly, with peaks in July 2023 and January 2024 (~1240 kWh)
  • Several months (Oct–Mar) show lower usage (~620 kWh)
  • Usage is higher in summer and winter months, lower in fall and early spring

# Analysis :
  • The data shows seasonal variation in electricity usage, with higher consumption in summer (July) and winter (January), and lower usage in fall and early spring.
  • The most recent total usage is 935 kWh.
  • The next scheduled meter read is on or after July 16, 2024.
